2025-07-18T21:05:00.CONTENT_EN:
Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that as informed by the Mainland Railway Authorities, the destination of High Speed Rail train G6048 /G6047 on 20 July 2025 travelling between Hong Kong West Kowloon Station and Zhanjiangxi Station will change to Guangzhounan Station due to adverse weather conditions. 

Trains affected:
G6048 (will arrive at Guangzhounan Station)
G6047 (will depart from Guangzhounan Station)

For the latest train schedules, please refer to the 12306 official website (12306. cn). You may also check latest train information from the HSR website, mobile app or see the information provided at Hong Kong West Kowloon Station.
2025-07-18T21:05:00.CONTENT_CN:
運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，內地鐵路單位通報，由於天氣情況惡劣，2025年07月20日原定來往香港西九龍站及湛江西站的高速鐵路列車車次G6048 /G6047，更改為來往香港西九龍站至廣州南站。

受影響車次:
G6048 (終到站更改為廣州南站)
G6047 (始發站更改為廣州南站)

有關車次的資料，請留意12306官方網站(12306.cn)，如已安裝手機應用程式，可按「車站大屏」頁面。您亦可留意於高速鐵路網頁、手機應用程式或香港西九龍站發放的最新資訊。

2025-07-18T22:50:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to malfunction of traffic lights at the junction of Connaught Road West and Western Fire Services Street, motorists are advised to drive with utmost care when passing through the road junctions, pay extra attention to the traffic signs and safety of pedestrians. Pedestrians please pay attention to vehicles when crossing junctions with malfunctioned traffic lights.
2025-07-18T22:50:00.CONTENT_CN: 由於干諾道西和西消防街交界路口的交通燈失靈，駕駛人士在駛經有關路口時，請加倍小心，注意交通標誌的指示並留意過路行人的安全。行人在交通燈失靈的路口橫過馬路時，請特別注意車輛。

2025-07-19T01:05:00.CONTENT_EN: The traffic lights at the junction of Connaught Road West and Western Fire Services Street have resumed normal services.
2025-07-19T01:05:00.CONTENT_CN: 位於干諾道西和西消防街交界路口的交通燈已恢復正常運作。

愉景灣開出尾班船：2025年7月20日上午12時30分開出

港九小輪控股有限公司
-中環至榕樹灣航線
中環開出尾班船:2025年7月20日上午12時30分
榕樹灣開出尾班船:2025年7月19日下午11時30分

-中環至索罟灣航線:
中環開出尾班船:2025年7月19日下午11時30分
索罟灣開出尾班船:2025年7月19日下午10時40分

-中環至坪洲航線
中環開出尾班船:2025年7月20日上午12時30分
坪洲開出尾班船:2025年7月19日下午11時30分

-坪洲至喜靈洲航線:
坪洲開出尾班船:2025年7月20日上午1時
喜靈洲開出尾班船:2025年7月19日下午9時55分。

2025-07-20T02:03:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to the effect of tropical cyclone, all inner harbour and outlying islands ferry services have been suspended until further notice.
2025-07-20T02:03:00.CONTENT_CN: 因受熱帶氣旋的影響，所有港內線及港外線渡輪均已停止服務，直至另行通知。

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Hong Kong West Kowloon Station Public Car Park Now Full
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 香港西九龍站公眾停車場現已泊滿

2025-07-19T11:50:00.CONTENT_EN: Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that Hong Kong West Kowloon Station Public Car Park is now full. Please use public transport to reach the station.
2025-07-19T11:50:00.CONTENT_CN: 運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知， 香港西九龍站公眾停車場現已泊滿。請使用公共交通工具前往。

2025-07-19T14:20:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to hoisting of Strong Wind Signal No. 3 and the associated wet weather, Transport Department appeals motorists and the commuters to: i. pay attention to the special traffic and transport arrangements may be implemented; ii. pay attention to the possible traffic congestions of the roads; iii. plan the journey in advance; iv. allow more traveling time to cater for delay; v. drive with extra care and patience; and vi. take heed of traffic situation particularly at busy junctions with obstructive views.
2025-07-19T14:20:00.CONTENT_CN: 由於三號強風信號現正生效、天雨路滑，運輸署呼籲駕駛人士及乘客須: i.留意當局可能會實施特別的交通及運輸措施； ii.留意在個別道路可能會出現交通擠塞的情況； iii.提早計劃行程路線； iv.預留充裕時間出門； v.小心駕駛及保持忍讓；及 vi.特别留意視線受阻的交通繁忙路口。

2025-07-20T00:20:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to hoisting of No. 8 Northeast Gale or Storm Signal and the associated wet weather, Transport Department appeals motorists and the commuters to: i. pay attention to the special traffic and transport arrangements may be implemented; ii. pay attention to the possible traffic congestions of the roads; iii. plan the journey in advance; iv. allow more traveling time to cater for delay; v. drive with extra care and patience; and vi. take heed of traffic situation particularly at busy junctions with obstructive views.
2025-07-20T00:20:00.CONTENT_CN: 由於八號東北烈風或暴風信號現正生效、天雨路滑，運輸署呼籲駕駛人士及乘客須: i.留意當局可能會實施特別的交通及運輸措施； ii.留意在個別道路可能會出現交通擠塞的情況； iii.提早計劃行程路線； iv.預留充裕時間出門； v.小心駕駛及保持忍讓；及 vi.特别留意視線受阻的交通繁忙路口。

2025-07-20T07:20:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to hoisting of Increasing Gale or Storm Signal No. 9 and the associated wet weather, Transport Department appeals motorists and the commuters to: i. pay attention to the special traffic and transport arrangements may be implemented; ii. pay attention to the possible traffic congestions of the roads; iii. plan the journey in advance; iv. allow more traveling time to cater for delay; v. drive with extra care and patience; and vi. take heed of traffic situation particularly at busy junctions with obstructive views.
2025-07-20T07:20:00.CONTENT_CN: 由於九號烈風或暴風風力增強信號現正生效、天雨路滑，運輸署呼籲駕駛人士及乘客須: i.留意當局可能會實施特別的交通及運輸措施； ii.留意在個別道路可能會出現交通擠塞的情況； iii.提早計劃行程路線； iv.預留充裕時間出門； v.小心駕駛及保持忍讓；及 vi.特别留意視線受阻的交通繁忙路口。

2025-07-20T09:20:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to hoisting of Hurricane Signal No. 10 and the associated wet weather, Transport Department appeals motorists and the commuters to: i. pay attention to the special traffic and transport arrangements may be implemented; ii. pay attention to the possible traffic congestions of the roads; iii. plan the journey in advance; iv. allow more traveling time to cater for delay; v. drive with extra care and patience; and vi. take heed of traffic situation particularly at busy junctions with obstructive views.
2025-07-20T09:20:00.CONTENT_CN: 由於十號颶風信號現正生效、天雨路滑，運輸署呼籲駕駛人士及乘客須: i.留意當局可能會實施特別的交通及運輸措施； ii.留意在個別道路可能會出現交通擠塞的情況； iii.提早計劃行程路線； iv.預留充裕時間出門； v.小心駕駛及保持忍讓；及 vi.特别留意視線受阻的交通繁忙路口。

2025-07-20T16:10:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to hoisting of No. 8 Southeast Gale or Storm Signal and the associated wet weather, Transport Department appeals motorists and the commuters to: i. pay attention to the special traffic and transport arrangements may be implemented; ii. pay attention to the possible traffic congestions of the roads; iii. plan the journey in advance; iv. allow more traveling time to cater for delay; v. drive with extra care and patience; and vi. take heed of traffic situation particularly at busy junctions with obstructive views.
2025-07-20T16:10:00.CONTENT_CN: 由於八號東南烈風或暴風信號現正生效、天雨路滑，運輸署呼籲駕駛人士及乘客須: i.留意當局可能會實施特別的交通及運輸措施； ii.留意在個別道路可能會出現交通擠塞的情況； iii.提早計劃行程路線； iv.預留充裕時間出門； v.小心駕駛及保持忍讓；及 vi.特别留意視線受阻的交通繁忙路口。

2025-07-19T18:52:00.CONTENT_EN: As informed by the Mainland Railway Authorities, some High Speed Rail train services on 20 July 2025 traveling between Hong Kong West Kowloon Station and Mainland have been cancelled or had their departing station and destination changed due to adverse weather conditions. Cancelled train service: To Guangzhounan Station: G6582 / G6584 To Shenzhenbei Station: G5636 / G5638/ G5640 / G5642 From Guangzhounan Station: G6581 / G6583 From Shenzhenbei Station: G5637 / G5639 / G5641 / G5643 Departing Station/Destination Changed: G6048 (Arrive at Guangzhounan Station) G6047 (Departure from Guangzhounan Station) For the latest train schedules, please refer to the 12306 official website (12306. cn/en/) or the mobile app. You may also check latest train information from the HSR website, mobile app or see the information provided at Hong Kong West Kowloon Station. You may also consider taking the East Rail Line to Lo Wu/ Lok Ma Chau or using other transport to enter the Mainland. For ticket refunds, please refer to the High Speed Rail website and process within the time stated. Please use the 12306 official website (12306. cn/en/) or mobile app and avoid coming to Hong Kong West Kowloon Station.
2025-07-19T18:52:00.CONTENT_CN: 內地鐵路單位通報，由於天氣情況惡劣，2025年07月20日部分來往香港西九龍站及內地的高速鐵路列車車次取消或需要更改始發站及終到站。 已取消的車次: 前往廣州南站:G6582 /G6584 前往深圳北站:G5636 /G5638 /G5640 /G5642 由廣州南站出發:G6581 /G6583 由深圳北站出發:G5637 /G5639 /G5641 /G5643 更改始發站及終到站的車次: G6048 (終到站更改為廣州南站) G6047 (始發站更改為廣州南站) 有關車次的資料，請留意12306官方網站(12306.cn)，如已安裝手機應用程式，可按「車站大屏」頁面。您亦可留意於高速鐵路網頁、手機應用程式或香港西九龍站發放的最新資訊。 您可考慮乘搭東鐵綫經羅湖/落馬洲，或使用其他跨境交通工具前往內地。 如需退票，請參閱高速鐵路網頁並於指定日期內辦理。請盡量使用12306官方網站(12306.cn)或手機應用程式，不用急於到香港西九龍站辦理。

2025-07-20T11:02:00.CONTENT_EN: Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that as coordinated with the Mainland, all departures from and arrivals to Hong Kong West Kowloon Station before 3pm today have been cancelled. Some departures and arrivals after 3pm will also be cancelled. Passengers should check their train information through 12306 official website (12306. cn) before their journeys, mobile app or HSR website; stay tuned for the road or traffic conditions, and allow more time to travel to Hong Kong West Kowloon Station.
2025-07-20T11:02:00.CONTENT_CN:
運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，港鐵公司與內地鐵路單位作出協調後，今日下午三時前所有由香港西九龍站北上及南下的高速鐵路班次已經取消。下午三時後部分班次亦會取消。 乘客出發前，請在12306官⽅網站(12306.cn)、⼿機應⽤程式或⾼速鐵路網⾴查閱 
有關班次的資料，留意路⾯或交通情況的最新公佈消息，並預留額外時間前往⾹港西九⿓站。

2025-07-20T16:59:00.CONTENT_EN: Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that The Hong Kong Observatory has announced that the Gale or Storm Signal No.8 is now issued. High Speed Rail train service is gradually resuming. The departure time of individual train may subject to change. Before your journey, please check your train information through 12306 official website (12306. cn), mobile app or HSR website ; stay turned to the road or traffic conditions, and allow more time to travel to Hong Kong West Kowloon Station. If you purchased your ticket through the 12306 official website (12306. cn) or mobile app and would like to make changes to your journey, you may change the booking or obtain a ticket refund up to 45 minutes before the train departure time using the original purchase process.
2025-07-20T16:59:00.CONTENT_CN:
運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，香港天文台公佈8號烈風或暴風信號信號現正生效。高速鐵路列車服務已經逐步恢復。然而，個別列車的開出時間或會有所改動。 出發前，請在12306官方網站(12306.cn)、手機應用程式或高速鐵路網頁查閱 
有關班次的資料，留意路面或交通情況的最新公佈消息，並預留額外時間前往香港西九龍站。 乘客如果之前透過12306官方網站(12306.cn)或手機應用程式購買高鐵車票，如果想更改行程，可以透過12306平台，在列車出發前45分鐘辦理更改或取消車次。

2025-07-19T21:12:00.CONTENT_EN:

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Lok Ma Chau – Huanggang Cross-boundaryShuttle Bus
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 落馬洲 – 皇崗穿梭巴士

2025-07-19T21:29:00.CONTENT_EN:
Due to Tropical Cyclone, the service of cross-boundary coach will be adjusted as follows:

Lok Ma Chau – Huanggang Cross-boundary Shuttle Bus
Will continue to provide normal service for at least two hours after the signal is hoisted, with enhanced frequency if necessary. Afterward, the Shuttle Bus service will operate at 30-minute intervals. Service adjustments may be made depending on weather or road conditions. Passengers are advised to stay updated by following our latest announcements.
2025-07-19T21:29:00.CONTENT_CN:
因受熱帶氣旋影響，跨境巴士服務安排如下：

落馬洲-皇崗過境穿梭巴士
維持正常服務至八號信號生效後最少兩小時，並在有需要時加密班次，其後班次會調整至每三十分鐘一班。若因應天氣或路面狀況，服務有需要進一步調整，會適時公布。

2025-07-20T00:02:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to Tropical Cyclone, the service of cross-boundary coach will be adjusted as follows: -The service of Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge Shuttle Bus will be suspended at 1 am. -Lok Ma Chau – Huanggang Cross-boundary Shuttle Bus will remain limited services. -Short-haul Cross-boundary Coach Service Mong Kok Route (Northbound): Last departure operated at 2:00 am Mong Kok Route (Southbound): Last departure operated at 2:00 am Wan Chai Route (Northbound): Last departure operated at 2:00 am Wan Chai Route (Southbound): Last departure operated at 2:00 am Yau Tsim Route (Northbound): Last departure operated at 12:20 am Yau Tsim Route (Southbound): Last departure operated at 12:20 am Kwun Tong Route (Northbound): Last departure operated at 12:20 am Kwun Tong Route (Southbound): Last departure operated at 12:20 am Tsuen Wan Route (Northbound): Last departure operated at 2:00 am Tsuen Wan Route (Southbound): Last departure operated at 2:00 am
2025-07-20T00:02:00.CONTENT_CN: 因受熱帶氣旋影響，跨境巴士服務安排如下： -港珠澳大橋穿梭巴士會在上午1時暫停服務 -落馬洲-皇崗過境穿梭巴士服務會維持有限度服務。 -短途跨境巴士服務 旺角線(北行)：尾班車上午2時00分開出 旺角線(南行)：尾班車上午2時00分開出 灣仔線(北行)：尾班車上午2時00分開出 灣仔線(南行)：尾班車上午2時00分開出 油尖線(北行)：尾班車上午12時20分開出 油尖線(南行)：尾班車上午12時20分開出 觀塘線(北行)：尾班車上午12時20分開出 觀塘線(南行)：尾班車上午12時20分開出 荃灣線(北行)：尾班車上午2時00分開出 荃灣線(南行)：尾班車上午2時00分開出

2025-07-20T02:24:00.CONTENT_EN:
Due to Tropical Cyclone, the service of cross boundary bus are adjusted as follows:

-The service of Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge Shuttle Bus has been suspended. 

-Lok Ma Chau – Huanggang Cross-boundary Shuttle Bus will remain limited services. 

-Short-haul Cross-boundary Coach Service

Mong Kok Route (Northbound): Suspended
Mong Kok Route (Southbound): Suspended
Wan Chai Route (Northbound): Suspended
Wan Chai Route (Southbound): Suspended

Kwun Tong Route (Southbound): Suspended
Tsuen Wan Route (Northbound): Suspended

-港珠澳大橋穿梭巴士已暫停服務

-落馬洲-皇崗過境穿梭巴士服務會維持有限度服務。

2025-07-19T23:15:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to high wind , the following arrangements will be implemented on cycle track and footpath of Cross Bay Bridge at Tseung Kwan O: Members of the public heading for Cross Bay Bridge are advised that the cycle track and footpath of the Cross Bay Bridge are going to be closed soon due to high wind. Please use alternative route for travelling to LOHAS Park and Tiu Keng Leng.
2025-07-19T23:15:00.CONTENT_CN: 因強風，將軍澳跨灣大橋單車徑及行人路將實施下列安排: 前往跨灣大橋人士請注意，因強風，跨灣大橋單車徑及行人路即將封閉。請改用其他單車徑及行人路前往日出康城及調景嶺。

2025-07-20T00:25:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to high wind , the following arrangements have been implemented on cycle track and footpath of Cross Bay Bridge at Tseung Kwan O: Members of the public heading for Cross Bay Bridge are advised that the cycle track and footpath of the Cross Bay Bridge have been closed due to high wind. Please use alternative route for travelling to LOHAS Park and Tiu Keng Leng.
2025-07-20T00:25:00.CONTENT_CN: 因強風，將軍澳跨灣大橋單車徑及行人路現已實施下列安排: 前往跨灣大橋人士請注意，因強風，跨灣大橋單車徑及行人路已經封閉。請改用其他單車徑及行人路前往日出康城及調景嶺。

2025-07-20T02:09:00.CONTENT_EN: Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that MTRCL will coordinate with the Mainland if the weather conditions deteriorate, or a higher Tropical Cyclone Warning Signal is issued, and train services may be suspended. Passengers should check their train information through 12306 official website (12306. cn) before their journeys, mobile app or HSR website; stay tuned for the road or traffic conditions, and allow more time to travel to Hong Kong West Kowloon Station.
2025-07-20T02:09:00.CONTENT_CN:
運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，若天氣情況惡化或天文台發出較高熱帶氣旋警告信號，將與內地鐵路單位作出協調，高速鐵路列車服務或會暫停。 乘客出發前，請在12306官方網站(12306.cn)、手機應用程式或高速鐵路網頁查閱 
有關班次的資料，留意路面或交通情況的最新公佈消息，並預留額外時間前往香港西九龍站。

2025-07-20T04:59:00.CONTENT_EN: Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that as advised by Mainland Railway Authority, all morning trips and some of the afternoon trips for High Speed Rail train services between Hong Kong West Kowloon Station and mainland has been cancelled. Passengers should check their train information through 12306 official website (12306. cn) before their journeys, mobile app or HSR website; stay tuned for the road or traffic conditions, and allow more time to travel to Hong Kong West Kowloon Station. For ticket refunds, please use the 12306 website (12306. cn/) or mobile app within the designated period.
2025-07-20T04:59:00.CONTENT_CN:
運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，內地鐵路單位通報，受颱風影響，2025年7月20日上午所有及下午部分來往香港西九龍站及内地的高速鐵路列車服務取消。 乘客出發前，請在12306官方網站(12306.cn)、手機應用程式或高速鐵路網頁查閱 
有關班次的資料，留意路面或交通情況的最新公佈消息，並預留額外時間前往香港西九龍站。 如需退票，可於指定日期内透過12306官方網站(12306.cn)或手機應用程式辦理退票。

2025-07-20T11:30:00.CONTENT_EN:
Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that as coordinated with the Mainland, all departures from and arrivals to Hong Kong West Kowloon Station before 3pm today (20 Jul 2025) have been cancelled. Some departures and arrivals after 3pm will also be cancelled.

North Bound Trains: G5610, G5624, G5820, G872, G6524, G6566, G6552, G6080, G5822, G5626, G5602, G3006, G6510, G5638, G826, G306, G5812, G6574, G5628, G6554, G2964, G6540, G6048, G5640, G6528, G5816, G6534, G5630, G6584, G80, G6546, G408, G100, G5818, G5642, G6568, G6542, G320, G5632, G6556, G6516, G5858, G5802, G5644, G6530, G5808, G5860, G6536, G5620, G5804, G6392, G5646, G6558, G3002, G5810, G3004, G6508, G5606, G418, G6578, G6548, G6570, G6580, G6560, G6526, G6562, G5658, G5618, G5614, G5636, G6582

21 Jul 2025:

South Bound Trains: G79

North Bound Trains: G5656

Before your journey, please check your train information through 12306 official website (12306. cn) mobile app or HSR website; stay turned to the road or traffic conditions, and allow more time to travel to Hong Kong West Kowloon Station. 

For ticket refunds, please use the 12306 website (12306. cn) or mobile app within the designated period. 

Hong Kong West Kowloon Station remains open, but for safety considerations, please avoid going to the Hong Kong West Kowloon Station during typhoon. 
.

2025-07-20T07:00:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to high wind , the following traffic and transport arrangements will be implemented on Cross Bay Bridge at Tseung Kwan O : Motorists heading for Cross Bay Bridge are advised that the Cross Bay Bridge is going to be closed soon due to high wind. Motorists are advised to use alternative route for travelling to LOHAS Park, Kowloon and Tiu Keng Leng.
2025-07-20T07:00:00.CONTENT_CN: 因強風，將軍澳跨灣大橋將實施下列交通及運輸安排: 前往跨灣大橋駕駛人士請注意，因強風，跨灣大橋即將封閉。駕駛人士請改用其他道路前往日出康城、九龍及調景嶺。

2025-07-20T08:30:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to strong wind condition, the following special traffic and transport arrangements have been implemented on Shenzhen Bay Bridge, with the details as shown below: The middle lanes of both bounds of the Shenzhen Bay Bridge are closed. Shenzhen bound goods vehicles should keep to the slow lane on the Bridge to enter the Cargo Clearance Area of Shenzhen Bay Port. All other Shenzhen bound vehicles should keep to the fast lane to enter the Passenger Clearance Area of Shenzhen Bay Port. The speed limit of the Shenzhen Bay Bridge is lowered from 100 km/h to 50 km/h.
2025-07-20T08:30:00.CONTENT_CN: 因強⾵關係，深圳灣公路大橋已實施以下特別交通及運輸安排: 深圳灣公路大橋來回方向的中線已經封閉。往深圳方向的貨車請使用慢線以進入深圳灣口岸貨物檢查區，而其他往深圳方向的車輛請使用快線以進入深圳灣口岸旅客檢查區。深圳灣公路大橋的最高車速限制由每小時100 公里降低至每小時50 公里。

2025-07-20T15:10:00.CONTENT_EN: Amber Rainstorm Warning Signal is in force. Due to wet weather and slippery roads, Transport Department appeals motorists and the commuters to: i. plan the journey in advance; ii. allow more traveling time; iii. drive with extra care and patience; and iv. take heed of traffic situation particularly at busy junctions with obstructive views.
2025-07-20T15:10:00.CONTENT_CN: 黃色暴雨警告信號現已生效，天雨路滑，運輸署呼籲駕駛人士及乘客須: i.提早計劃行程路線； ii.預留充裕時間出門； iii.小心駕駛及保持忍讓；及 iv.留意交通情況，特别在視線受阻的繁忙路口。

2025-07-20T15:45:00.CONTENT_EN: Red Rainstorm Warning Signal is in force. Due to wet weather and slippery roads, Transport Department appeals motorists and the commuters to: i. plan the journey in advance; ii. allow more traveling time; iii. drive with extra care and patience; and iv. take heed of traffic situation particularly at busy junctions with obstructive views.
2025-07-20T15:45:00.CONTENT_CN: 紅色暴雨警告信號現已生效，天雨路滑，運輸署呼籲駕駛人士及乘客須: i.提早計劃行程路線； ii.預留充裕時間出門； iii.小心駕駛及保持忍讓；及 iv.留意交通情況，特别在視線受阻的繁忙路口。
